channel.title: CPU on Ziyi Cai
channel.description: Recent content in CPU on Ziyi Cai

item.title: Foundation
item.description: This project is assigned in MS108 course. We implemented an emulated RISCV32I CPU in verilog. Our final code could be loaded into a FPGA board to run real RISC-V programs. My design is based on Tomasulo algorithm with hardware-based speculation. The tutorial repo is here. And my code is here.
